sentences.en: " Doodle - bug, doodle - bug, tell me what I want to know!
sentences.cn: “ 小甲虫, 小甲虫, 告诉我这究竟是怎么回事!

sentences.en: Actually it is a 3 D rift valley doodle work.
sentences.cn: 但其实是一幅三维的峡谷涂鸦作品.

sentences.en: After that, Doodle and I often went down to Old Woman Swamp.
sentences.cn: 从那以后, 嘟嘟和我就常常去老妇沼泽了.

sentences.en: Brad was doodling on a sheet of paper.
sentences.cn: 布拉德在一张纸上乱涂着。

sentences.en: Cock - a - doodle - doo, Cock - a - doodle - doo. I know how to flatter.
sentences.cn: “喔──喔──喔──, 喔 ─ ─喔──喔. 我知道怎样奉承别人了. ”

sentences.en: Dillworthy was staring into space, with a scrawl of doodles on the pad in front of him.
sentences.cn: 迪尔沃西凝望着天空，面前的纸上满是涂鸦。

sentences.en: Ding Wen and Xin Mei demonstrate Doodle Kids.
sentences.cn: 鼎文和欣梅示范小涂鸦软件.

sentences.en: Don't doodle on this piece of paper.
sentences.cn: 不要在那张纸上胡乱划拉.

sentences.en: He looked across at Jackson, doodling on his notebook.
sentences.cn: 他一边看着对面的杰克逊，一边在笔记本上信手涂鸦。

sentences.en: I often doodle when I'm on the phone.
sentences.cn: 我打电话时常常信手乱画。

sentences.en: Kid, obedient behave yourself, and don't doodle!
sentences.cn: 小朋友, 听话, 不要乱图乱画!

sentences.en: Perhaps, pure canvas shoes and doodle.
sentences.cn: 或者, 洁白的帆布鞋和涂鸦.

sentences.en: Random statistics class doodle, redrawn later as a style comparison.
sentences.cn: 上统计学课的时候随便画的 ﹐ 来为了比较画风又重画了一遍.

sentences.en: Shark Encounter'started out as a random doodle in my sketch book.
sentences.cn: 遭遇鲨鱼》(灵感)自于在我速写本上的一张涂鸦.

sentences.en: We sang these lines to the tune of Yankee Doodle.
sentences.cn: 我们用扬基歌的曲调唱这几句歌词.

sentences.en: Yankee doodle stuck a feather in his cap and called it macaroni.
sentences.cn: Yankeedoodle帽上插根羽毛,称为时髦帅哥.

sentences.en: You do doodle on them, I always wrote all over mine.
sentences.cn: 你在你的书上乱写乱画, 我也总是这样对待我自己的书.

trans.tran_en: A doodle is a pattern or picture that you draw when you are bored or thinking about something else

trans.tran_cn: 混时间, 闲荡, 涂鸦
trans.tran_en: When someone doodles, they draw doodles
to draw shapes, lines, or patterns without really thinking about what you are doing
